Seeding ScriptÂ¶

Write seed node choices for a given graph file

seed.choose_seeds(graph, num_players, num_seeds)

Return one flat tuple of the seed nodes for each round

If num_seeds is 2 and NUM_ROUNDS is 2, the seed list will look like: [‘Seed1ForRound1’, ‘Seed2ForRound1’, ‘Seed1ForRound2’, ‘Seed2ForRound2’]

Parameters:
  • graph – NetworkX Graph
  • num_players (int) – number of players competing on the graph
  • num_seeds (int) – number of seeds to choose each round
Returns:

names of seed nodes
Return type:

tuple
seed.read_graph(graph_path)

Read graph at given path and return graph with metadata

Parameters:graph_path (str) – path to graph file
Returns:NetworkX Graph, number of players, and number of seeds
Return type:tuple
seed.run(graph_path)

Read the graph at the given path and return the names of the seed nodes

Parameters:graph_path – path to graph file
Returns:names of seed nodes
Return type:tuple
seed.write_seeds(seeds)

Write the names of the seed nodes

Parameters:seeds (tuple) – names of seed nodes
